stochastic_function: lambda usage_decision: {0.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else {10.0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'restrict' else {100.0: 1.0}

lambda usage_decision, carcinogenic_activity, human_exposure: {0: 1.0} if usage_decision == 'ban' else ({0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'inactive' else ({-0.05: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-0.5: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-5.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-1.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-10.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-100.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'high' and usage_decision == 'restrict' else {-0.5: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'low' and usage_decision == 'permit' else {-5.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'medium' and usage_decision == 'permit' else {-50.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'moderate' and human_exposure == 'high' and usage_decision == 'permit' else {-10.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'low' and usage_decision == 'permit' else {-100.0: 1.0} if carcinogenic_activity == 'very active' and human_exposure == 'medium' and usage_decision == 'permit' else {-1000.0: 1.0}))

lambda economic_value, cancer_cost: {economic_value + cancer_cost: 1.0} if economic_value in [0.0, 10.0, 100.0] and cancer_cost in [-1000.0, -100.0, -50.0, -10.0, -5.0, -1.0, -0.5, -0.05, 0.0] else {}
